attributes.action: Legally prohibit MPs employing family members funded through the Commons expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent abuse of staff allowances by an MP, it shows the practice of employing family members is out of date.  There may have been a time when we could rely on MPs sense of honour to prevent them from ripping off the public.  The recent case and other undisclosed cases prove we no longer can.  It is time for the Prime Minister to bring this aspect of politics into the 21st Century by abolishing this shameful practice - applying to all MPs including existing members and their relatives with immediate effect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
